00048 CAudio *g_Audio = NULL;
00049 TCHAR *gSoundExtentions[] = { _T(".mp3"), _T(".wav"), _T(".midi"), _T(".ogg") };

00061 //
00062 // CAudio::VShutdown                    - Chapter 12, page 404
00063 //
00064 void CAudio::VShutdown()
00065 {
00066         IAudioBuffer *audioBuffer = NULL;
00067         AudioBufferList::iterator i=m_AllSamples.begin();
00068 
00069         while (i!=m_AllSamples.end())
00070         {
00071                 audioBuffer = (*i);
00072                 audioBuffer->VStop();
00073                 m_AllSamples.pop_front();
00074         }
00075 }
00076 
00077 //
00078 // CAudio::VPauseAllSounds                      - Chapter 12, page 404
00079 //   Stop all active sounds, including music
00080 //
00081 void CAudio::VPauseAllSounds()
00082 {
00083         IAudioBuffer *audioBuffer = NULL;
00084 
00085         AudioBufferList::iterator i;
00086         for(i=m_AllSamples.begin(); i!=m_AllSamples.end(); ++i)
00087         {
00088                 audioBuffer = (*i);
00089                 audioBuffer->VStop();
00090         }
00091 
00092         m_AllPaused=true;
00093 }
00094 
00095 //
00096 // CAudio::VResumeAllSounds                             - Chapter 12, page 404
00097 //
00098 void CAudio::VResumeAllSounds()
00099 {
00100         IAudioBuffer *audioBuffer = NULL;
00101         AudioBufferList::iterator i;
00102 
00103         for(i=m_AllSamples.begin(); i!=m_AllSamples.end(); ++i)
00104         {
00105                 audioBuffer = (*i);
00106                 audioBuffer->VResume();
00107         }
00108 
00109         m_AllPaused=false;
00110 }
00111 
00112 //
00113 // CAudio::VStopAllSounds                                       - Chapter 12, page 405
00114 //
00115 void CAudio::VStopAllSounds()
00116 {
00117         IAudioBuffer *audioBuffer = NULL;
00118 
00119         AudioBufferList::iterator i;
00120         for(i=m_AllSamples.begin(); i!=m_AllSamples.end(); ++i)
00121         {
00122                 audioBuffer = (*i);
00123                 audioBuffer->VStop();
00124         }
00125 
00126         m_AllPaused=false;
00127 }

00131 //
00132 // CAudio::FindSoundTypeFromFile                        - Chapter 12, page 405
00133 //
00134 SoundType CAudio::FindSoundTypeFromFile(TCHAR const * const fileName)
00135 {
00136         int type = SOUND_TYPE_FIRST;
00137 
00138         while (type!=SOUND_TYPE_COUNT)
00139         {
00140                 if (_tcsstr(fileName, gSoundExtentions[type]))
00141                         return SoundType(type);
00142                 type++;
00143         }
00144         return SOUND_TYPE_UNKNOWN;
00145 }

00148 
00149 bool CAudio::HasSoundCard(void)
00150 {
00151         return (g_Audio && g_Audio->VActive());
00152 }
